about_the_game:
Three days until the baby arrives. Three days to save the world.

Welcome to the House

A new baby is coming in three days! There’s so much to do, especially if Barty Bear is to prevent the Colic from returning once again. Luckily, with the help of the Bubble Fairy, Barty has all the time he needs. Explore the House to recover the lost puppies who hold the key to stopping this calamity. Or choose to go in a completely different direction, discovering several alternate plans to save the day.

At any point during the three-day cycle, you can choose to loop back in time to the morning of the first day. But before you restart, the Bubble Fairy will let you keep some things with you. Powerups, relationship statuses, quest progress... you have the freedom to choose exactly how to start the new cycle!

  • Explore each and every room in the House. From the quaint Stuffie's Town to the tropical Bathtub Resort, from the spacious Kitchen to dusty Underbed, there's always secrets, stories, and surprises to discover.

  • Battle through hoards of hostile dust bunnies, rotten food, and not-age-appropriate toys, including over 40 boss battles!

  • Harness the abilities of nearly a dozen, kid-tested, parent-approved powerups. A blankie, floaties, a bottle, and more, Barty will need them all in order to save the day!

  • Collect a whole bunch of other helpful items as well, such as storybook pages, puzzle pieces, and letter blocks!

  • Play in six unique minigames, including the House's most-watched sport, The Playpen!

  • Meet and get to know over 300 NPCs, each with their own personality, likes, and dislikes.

  • Maintain Barty's relationship with every single toy in the game, and choose whether to save that relationship in the time loop or reset it.

  • Romance any of the twelve Old Toys, gaining their trust and providing them with comfort throughout the trying three days. Be careful though! A negative relationship with any of them could turn them into your nemesis, and Barty will soon find himself in the middle of a boss fight if he doesn't mind his manners!

  • Customize and decorate the Old Toys' Bin (their headquarters and home) using dozens of different themes and items.

  • Master the time loop by choosing exactly when Barty returns to the morning of his first day in the House.

  • Execute strategic decisions as to who or what is not reset with the change in time. This includes NPCs memories and relationships, quest progress, enemies and bosses defeated, or collectables and powerups discovered.

  • End the three day cycle on your own terms, whenever you think Barty has done enough to prepare for the oncoming Colic. Your preparations and discoveries will dictate what the future holds for the toys in the House.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7500U CPA @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or integrated audio

reviews:
“With visuals of a child’s playroom staring at me, the contrast between playful aesthetics and dark undertones was notable.”
Indie Informer

“The high stress of Majora’s Mask but balanced by some elements of... cozy.”
Hello Hyrule: A Zelda Travelogue Podcastt
short_description: Discover the world of Barty’s Adventure: a cozy, time-loop metroidvania set in the world of children’s toys. Make new friends, explore unique biomes, and master the three-day cycle to stop the Colic from returning once and for all!
